page.title: 05My Family Weekend
page.content: On Sunday I stop in bed a bit longer.Sometimes I watch a film on video. My mum gets up to make our breakfast. We have bacon and eggs. When I have finished I go to get washed in the bathroom. After that I go to call for my friend. We play on the street. When my mum calls me we go to my Grandma's. My cousin is there and I play with her. When we get home my dad and I go for a run to the field. I sit on the swings while he runs round. When we get home we are very tired. I have my dinner then. After that I go and play out until my mum calls me in to have my hair washed in the bath. When I have done that I watch television until I go to bed.
